rules.description: Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Change right_control key to command+control+option+shift. (Post escape key when pressed alone)
Change left_control key to command+control+option+shift. (Post escape key when pressed alone)
Map left_option to soft-meta for Alacritty
Change left_control key to command+control+option+shift. (Post escape key when pressed alone)
